com.samsung.android.sdk.cup

Class ScupMediaController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.cup.ScupWidgetBase
      • com.samsung.android.sdk.cup.ScupMediaController

  • public class ScupMediaController
extends ScupWidgetBase
    CUP Media Controller widget.
    This is a kind of extended widget. If a device can not support this widget, a device can display using the ScupButton widget instead of this.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  ScupMediaController.ClickListener
      This listener interface is called when user click button.

    • Method Detail

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Destroys a ScupMediaController instance.
        If the widget is shown on the screen, widget should be hidden automatically.
        Overrides:
        destroy in class ScupWidgetBase
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If widget is already destroyed.

      • setButtonImage

        public void setButtonImage(int type,
                  Bitmap[] bitmap)
        Sets the button image.
        Parameters:
        type - A button type. It is one of BUTTON_TYPE_PREV, BUTTON_TYPE_PLAY , BUTTON_TYPE_PAUSE and BUTTON_TYPE_NEXT.
        bitmap - The bitmap array. Array size can not over BUTTON_STATE_MAX. Each index means button states.
        BUTTON_STATE_NORMAL, BUTTON_STATE_PUSH, BUTTON_STATE_SELECT and BUTTON_STATE_DISABLE
        If each bitmap of bitmap is null, each image of button state is reset to default.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If type or bitmap size is invalid.
        See Also:
        BUTTON_TYPE_PREV, BUTTON_TYPE_PLAY, BUTTON_TYPE_PAUSE, BUTTON_TYPE_NEXT

      • setButtonImage

        public void setButtonImage(int type,
                  int[] resIds)
        Sets the background image.
        Parameters:
        type - A button type. It is one of BUTTON_TYPE_PREV, BUTTON_TYPE_PLAY , BUTTON_TYPE_PAUSE and BUTTON_TYPE_NEXT.
        resIds - The resource id array. Array size can not over BUTTON_STATE_MAX. Each index means button states.
        BUTTON_STATE_NORMAL, BUTTON_STATE_PUSH, BUTTON_STATE_SELECT and BUTTON_STATE_DISABLE
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If type is invalid. Or if resIds size is invalid or each resource id is invalid.
        See Also:
        BUTTON_TYPE_PREV, BUTTON_TYPE_PLAY, BUTTON_TYPE_PAUSE, BUTTON_TYPE_NEXT

      • setPadding

        public void setPadding(float left,
              float top,
              float right,
              float bottom)
        Sets padding values
        Parameters:
        left - Left padding value in point units
        top - Top padding value in point units
        right - Right padding value in point units
        bottom - Bottom padding value in point units
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If left, top, right or #bottom is negative.

      • setAlignment

        public void setAlignment(int align)
        Sets the alignment widget icon alignment
        Parameters:
        align - alignment. It is one of ScupWidgetBase.ALIGN_TOP, ScupWidgetBase.ALIGN_BOTTOM and ScupWidgetBase.ALIGN_VERTICAL_CENTER.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If align is invalid.
        See Also:
        ScupWidgetBase.ALIGN_TOP, ScupWidgetBase.ALIGN_BOTTOM, ScupWidgetBase.ALIGN_VERTICAL_CENTER

      • getAlignment

        public int getAlignment()

        Returns:
        alignment
        See Also:
        ScupWidgetBase.ALIGN_TOP, ScupWidgetBase.ALIGN_BOTTOM, ScupWidgetBase.ALIGN_VERTICAL_CENTER

      • setMediaState

        public void setMediaState(int state)
        Sets play mode
        Parameters:
        state - A media state. It is one of MEDIA_STATE_PLAY and MEDIA_STATE_PAUSE.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If state is invalid.
        See Also:
        MEDIA_STATE_PLAY, MEDIA_STATE_PAUSE
